template<class T>
void LibTIM::adjustContrast (  Image< T > &  im,
T  A,
T  B
) 
 

Same thing but with A and B given in parameters.

template<class T>
void LibTIM::adjustContrast (  Image< T > &  im  ) 
 

Scale image intensity according to the linear relation: x [a,b], f(x) [A,B] f(x)=A+(x-a)(B-A)/(b-a) In this version a=im.getMin(), b=im.getMax(), A=typeMin(), B=typeMax

std::map<TLabel,Point<double> > LibTIM::centroids (  Image< TLabel > &  im  )  [inline]
 

compute the centroids of labelled objects (first moments) in 2D images
